articles.author: Nektaria Stamouli
articles.title: Questions mount over latest migrant tragedy in Mediterranean - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Wednesday’s capsizing may be ‘the worst tragedy ever’ in the Mediterranean Sea, European Commissioner for Home Affairs Ylva Johansson says.
articles.content: Anger is growing over the handling of a migrant boat disaster off Greece last week that has become one of the biggest tragedies in the Mediterranean in years. The calamity is dominating the country’s… [+5845 chars]

articles.title: Lunar Inflation: European Scientists Set to Launch Moon-Bound Inflatable Radio Telescope - News Track English
articles.description: USA: An inflatable radio telescope for the Moon is what European scientists want to send there. The idea was developed following a recent feasibility study by the European Space Agency (ESA). The first few hundred million years after the Big Bang, when the fi…
